item.title: Indiewebify this site
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
Updating tags with Sydication links



"THIS ONE?:" https://chat.srkn.org/@ssp/statuses/01JDC33M70R9P4A0R5KAVCKGZ2
"THIS ONE?:" https://chat.srkn.org/@ssp/statuses/01JDC33M70R9P4A0R5KAVCKGZ2

Adding the H-card

Add this to the footer

        <p class="feet h-card vcard">{{ .Site.Title }} © 
        <a href={{ .Site.BaseURL }} 
            class="p-name u-url url author metatag" rel="me">
            {{ .Site.Author.name }}
        </a>
            <img src="{{ .Site.BaseURL }}{{ .Site.Author.photo }}" 
            class="u-photo" style="display: none"> 
            <a class="p-nickname u-email email metatag" rel="me" 
            href="mailto:{{ .Site.Author.email }}">
            {{ .Site.Author.nick }}
        </a> 
            2011-{{ .Now.Format "2006" }} • Licenced under 
            <a href="{{ .Site.BaseURL }}page/licence" 
            class="metatag">
            {{ .Site.Author.licence }}
        </a>
